channel.title: reactjs on Software engineering notes

item.title: React.js
item.description: Develop react.js without node.js 1 ) Initialize a react app Run a node container to install react app. It’s important to mount the current work space to container volume so that the created react app folder will be in local folder as well. Run docker container run -it -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:22 bash -w /app = WORKDIR /app -v "$(pwd):/app" = volumes .:/app Then you will enter the container.
